content: कोणः [कुण्-करणे घञ् कर्त्तरि अच् वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A corner, an angle (of anything); भयेन कोणे क्वचन स्थितस्य <ls>Vikr. 1. 99</ls>: युक्तमेतन्न तु पुनः कोणं नयनपद्मयोः <ls>Bv. 2. 173.</ls> {@--2@} An intermediate point of the compass. {@--3@} The bow of a lute; a fiddle-stick. {@--4@} The sharp edge of a sword or weapon. {@--5@} A stick, staff, club. {@--6@} A drum-stick. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of the planet Mars. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of the planet Saturn. {@--9@} A sort of musical instrument. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>Gr.</ab> {%gonia%}].
